member.name: M:RestClient.Net.RestClientExtensions.AddRestClient(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Func{System.String,System.Action{RestClient.Net.CreateClientOptions},System.IServiceProvider,RestClient.Net.IClient})
member.summary: Adds a CreateClient function to get or mint clients. Allows you to mint clients with createClient if you need to take control of construction
